==== Ubuntu Women Team ====
* Team Meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20131112|November 12th]]</nowiki>
* Launched evaluation of harvest.ubuntu.com, blog post: <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-women.org/2013/11/evaluating-harvest/|Evaluating harvest.ubuntu.com]]</nowiki>
* Launched <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/UWOP|Ubuntu Women Outreach Project]]</nowiki> (UWOP)
* Held <nowiki>[[http://summit.ubuntu.com/uds-1311/meeting/22058/community-1311-ubuntu-women/|virtual Ubuntu Developer Summit session]]</nowiki> for the project
** Blog post summary with notes, link to blueprint and video: <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-women.org/2013/11/ubuntu-women-at-vuds-1311-session-summary/|Ubuntu Women at vUDS 1311 session summary]]</nowiki>
